You will enjoy Greek snacks, cheeses, cold cuts, olives, local wine and some of the best Greek food and dessert whilst you mingle with locals in the center of Athens. After the market tour and tastings, you'll sit down for lunch at one of the most picturesque Greek tavernas in Athens!

payload.name: Private: Mythology, Acropolis Museum & Acropolis Tour
payload.description: Explore Athens’ ancient wonders on this private walking tour through the city's most significant sites. Visit the Temple of Olympian Zeus, ascend to the Parthenon on the Acropolis, and wander through the ruins of the Ancient Agora. End your journey at the acclaimed Acropolis Museum. With a professional guide and a personalized experience, you’ll gain deep insights into Greece’s rich history and classical legacy.

payload.name: Athens Night Walking Tour
payload.description: Explore Athens by night and discover its monuments, myths, and hidden gems in a magical, crowd-free walking tour. A unique experience under the stars!

payload.name: Athens: National Archaeological Museum Private Guided Tour
payload.description: Immerse yourself in ancient history at one of Athens' most esteemed museums—and bring the stories behind the artifacts to life—on this private guided tour of the National Archaeological Museum. Pick between morning and afternoon start times, meet your guide at your hotel, and then head into the celebrated museum. With your guide's expert commentary, learn and discover much more than you could independently.

payload.name: Rainbow Odyssey LGBTQ walking tour of Athens
payload.description:
"Embark on an unforgettable journey through Athens' vibrant LGBTQ+ scene with our exclusive tours of Omonia, Gazi, Psiri, and Agia Irini.

In Omonia, discover hidden gay cinemas and discreet cruising spots, offering a unique glimpse into the underground culture of the city.

Then, dive into the electric atmosphere of Gazi, Athens' premier gay district, where lively nightlife venues and welcoming communities await.

Explore the charming streets of Psiri, a hidden gem with a growing LGBTQ+ presence, lined with cozy cafes and hip bars where locals and travelers mingle in a relaxed atmosphere.

Finally, experience the emerging LGBTQ+ scene in Agia Irini, where gay-friendly coffee places create a welcoming environment for all.

Led by a local LGBTQ+ guide, you'll gain insights into the rich history and culture of Athens' LGBTQ+ community, ensuring an unforgettable and authentic experience. Join us and immerse yourself in the vibrant gay culture of Athens!"

payload.name: Royal Facial Treatment plus 20-minutes Free Fish Pedi
payload.description: Take some time to be pampered at the luxurious Athens Fish Spa Massage and Hammam with a unique and purifying facial treatment. At the spa, centrally located under the shadows of the Acropolis, feel your stresses slip away as your skin is exfoliated, rejuvenated, and brought back to life with pearl extract products.

payload.name: Short Walking Tour of Exarcheia, Athens.
payload.description: This tour is a way to avoid the crowds and popular tourist spots of Athens, taking visitors to the district of Exarcheia, the heart of city’s modern history. Visitors can feel like Athenian locals while walking around and experiencing the Athenian way of life, as well as learning of the historical events that defined modern Greece.

payload.name: Semi-Private Tour Athens to Tirana; Greece, Albania & N.Macedonia
payload.description: Visit the the amazing mountain formations in Kalabaka, admire the beauty of Ohrid Lake, be amazed by the Stari Most bridge and walk through the streets of Berat on this tour of seven countries. This small group tour brings you to the most important sites in seven different West Balkan countries, so you can stripe them off your bucket list! You will be visiting the UNESCO world heritage sites, with every place having its own charm and fascinating history.

payload.name: Athens's original vegan food tour
payload.description: Delve into Athens’ vegetarian cuisine on this special walking tour. Spend 3 hours exploring the city and stopping to try flavorful olives, honey, nuts, sesame bread, Greek coffee, loukoumades, and more. Taste at least 10 different local delicacies before your tour concludes. This tour can also be tailored to accommodate vegans.

payload.name: Unique Cocktail Tasting Experience In Centre Of Athens
payload.description:
Hey guys, we are a group of gastronomy and cocktail enthusiasts, founder of a community group for dancers and we also run community groups that allow travellers to connect.

This experience will be led by Dimitris, our cocktail and spirits master. We will start with an hour of chatting and getting to know each other. We will then take you to some of the best bars and restaurants to enjoy the Athens nightlife just like a local.

This is a really fun experience and all ages are welcome! (non-alcoholic drink alternatives are available).

payload.name: Private Transfer From Kifissia-Marousi-Chalandri to Athens City Center
payload.description:
Private Transfers to ensure a smooth and easy transport with our professional driver (English speaking driver). 

Get the best experience from your trip to this historic city and its neighboring requires you to have the best partner in the transportation service.

payload.name: Athens Meze Cooking Class and Dinner with an Acropolis View
payload.description: If there’s one dining experience that sums up Greek food, it’s meze sharing plates. This small-group class, with a minimum of four guests and a maximum of ten, gets you hands-on and cooking, washed down with aniseed-flavored ouzo. You’ll learn at least seven traditional dishes, from tzatziki and filo cheese pies to stuffed peppers and meatballs, then sit down and enjoy them with quality Greek wine and an Acropolis view.

payload.name: Dream Cooking Class in Athens
payload.description: This tour is a hands-on journey into authentic Greek gastronomy, led by a professional local chef who shares time-honored family recipes and insider culinary secrets. Set in a charming, intimate setting, it’s more than just a cooking class—it’s a sensory and cultural experience, where guests immerse themselves in Greek traditions, flavors, and the artistry of food. With small groups, personal attention, and a warm, convivial atmosphere, this experience goes beyond the kitchen, leaving guests with lifelong memories, new skills, and the ability to recreate the magic of Greece at home.

payload.name: Private Food Tour and Exclusive Cooking Lessons
payload.description:
This is the ultimate walking tour experience for every foodie who loves culture and a personal touch.

In 4 hours we show you all hotspots in the heart of Athens - with the most delicious food + drinks in town.

Discover the best spots, hidden gems, local secrets & most beautiful places in Athens.

You’ll try a new delicacy at each stop - come with us and feel the vibe.

PLUUUUUUUUUS your exclusive & private Cooking Lessons (because Christos loves to entertain you):

- Tzatziki that slaps + the best veggies as a salad

- Saganaki that FLAMES - we still dream of it

- Cocktails like a Greek sunset

Approved on many romantic Santorini nights by us two ;).

But wait - there’s more...

- A photo moment to say: I was REALLY here.

- A gift box with heart-picked memories to take home

Come hungry, leave full of love.

Perfect for everybody looking for something intimate & unforgettable.

Excited to meet you :-)!

Christina & Christos

payload.name: ATHENS Ancient Greece Symposium Dinner
payload.description:
This is the only guided dinner in Athens, in a beautiful restaurant overlooking the ancient Agora of Athens during which, mythology and tantalizing flavors form a beautiful culinary journey.

Each dish is related to an ancient Greek God and Anastasia, your experience curator will give you a story of each god while you are enjoying your dish.

In the end of the experience, all guests will receive Anastasia's signed book, Delicious Greek, with recipes to cook when back home and a valuable introduction on olive oil and the herbs and spices of Greece as they were used from antiquity till today!

A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE THAT SHOULD NOT BE MISSED WHILE IN ATHENS!

payload.name: Self Guided Tour In Athens With 100 Captivating Audio Stories
payload.description:
Uncover the Magic of Athens with Your Personal Audio Guide

Tired of feeling touristy — but still want to experience Athens? With 100 captivating audio stories straight to your phone, this self-guided audio tour is your key to discovering Athens’ most iconic landmarks such as the Syntagma square, as well as hidden gems.

Weave through Athens’ lively streets in Plaka and trendy neighborhoods in Psyri while this flexible walking tour lets you explore at your own pace — no groups, no schedules.

Get a personal guide in your pocket — all at a fraction of traditional tour prices:

✅ No app download — works directly from your browser

✅ Start anytime, anywhere

✅ Explore top sights & hidden gems

✅ Enjoy full flexibility with pause and resume features

✅ Vivid storytelling with soundscapes and voice narration.

✅ Perfect for solo travelers, couples, or families

After booking, just submit the last 5 digits of your phone number in the “promo code” field at App.trales.io to activate your access.

payload.name: Athens Couples Escape Spa Treatment with Fish Pedicure
payload.description: Take a break from non-stop sightseeing to treat yourself and your partner or friend to a few hours at the spa. After 30 minutes in the steam room, enjoy a side by side 60-minute full body massage. Next you each choose from a pedicure, manicure, or facial, depending on what you feel like. Finish off your spa experience together with a 20-minute fish pedicure.

payload.name: 2 Hour Athens Styled Photoshoot with professional photographer
payload.description:
Feel and look your best in this editorial style photoshoot by our professional team. Ideal for couples, solo photoshoots and families. Let your story unfold like a magazine cover while strolling around the iconic locations and the magic light of Athens.

You will receive 100 high resolution professionally color tuned images within 72 hours.

payload.name: Audioguided tour of Athens’ alternative neighbourhood of Exarchia
payload.description:
Let’s discover in total freedom and at your pace Exarchia, the alternative and anarchist neighbourhood of Athens, with this audioguided tour.

Let’s go beyond the clichés and discover the real Exarchia, a neighbourhood with a strong political culture and the home of anarchist activity in Greece. Exarchia promotes an alternative way of living, solidarity and inclusion with many initiatives based on self-management. Street art is everywhere; a form of expression visible and free to all.

This visit aims to help you understand and decode Exarchia, and gives you a political and social deep dive into today’s Greece.

The duration of the audio is 40 minutes, and the total duration of the visit is approximately 1h30, depending on your pace.

To use this audioguide, you need:

> a smartphone with enough battery

> to download the free app from which you can get the access to the audioguide

> ideally, headphones to keep your hands free

payload.name: Layover in Athens a Private Tour with a local: Best Highlights of Athens
payload.description: Isn't it better to explore the city than waiting at the airport lounge? Make the most of your time in Athens and experience the best of everything in Athens on this layover special private tour with a local, you will use public transport throughout this tour to enhance your local experience even more, you will visit the ancient, medieval and modern neighborhoods to see and appreciate the vast history and culture that the city has witnessed over the years, also try the best food, drinks, local favorite places to hangout and beat the touristic rush. Our fun and entertaining guide will make this a memorable experience for you filled with sightseeing, visitng local popular hangout places and trying the local food & drinks. It is one of the best experiences to immerse yourself into the rich local culture.

payload.name: Athens at night
payload.description:
ATHENS ... AT NIGHT! Noon

NIGHT WALK ON FOOT BY MONASTIRAKI, ANAFIOTIKA, PLAKA & TISEO

Daily at night throughout the year.

 Included in this excursion

 • Spanish speaking companion guide.

 • 3 hour walking tour.

 • Small groups of up to 7 travelers.

payload.name: Athens Evening Food tour
payload.description:
Discover one of the best-hidden tavernas of Athens, a real apocalypse even for locals.

You will taste regional specialties, try the best Greek food and snacks while you discover secret gastronomic gems in some of the most famous food areas of Athens. This food experience offers you a great variety of Greek food and helps you explore the best ingredients and recipes of the Greek cuisine.

Please note that the food market is closed during evening hours.

payload.name: Athens, Lake Vouliagmeni, Riveria Tour w/ Round Transportation
payload.description: Embark on a full-day journey to view the Sounion sunset. Discover the hidden gems of Athens, relish the beauty of Lake Vouliagmeni, and take in scenes of the riviera. Escape the chaos of the city as you enjoy convenient roundtrip transportation from your hotel. Join a small group for a personalized adventure in the countryside and become one with your natural surroundings, immersing yourself in the local culture and gathering firsthand knowledge.

payload.name: Athens by Night Walking Tour
payload.description: Get ready for a thrilling 2.5-hour adventure through Athens after dark, guided by a knowledgeable and friendly local tour leader who will take you on a tour of modern Greek traditions and ancient monuments alike.

payload.name: Athens Cooking Class with Local Hosts
payload.description: Skip the formal cooking classes when you're in Athens, and live the local culture for a few hours instead. Taking place in a private villa with garden, this relaxed class shows you how to cook Greek dishes from treasured recipes with your hosts Gianna and Elena. Garden-fresh ingredients, drinks, and good company complete the experience.

payload.name: Athens Private Photo Shoot
payload.description: Skip the awkward selfies and amateur snapshots and give your Athens vacation the memento it deserves with this private photo shoot. Join a professional local photographer and pose with your sweetheart, family, friends, or even as a solo traveler to capture your time in Greece’s capital city. Pose with famous landmarks, along quiet back streets, or at other locations that catch your eye.

payload.name: Athens Private Plaka, Monastiraki Walking Tour
payload.description: Discover two of Athens’ most iconic neighborhoods as you embark on a private walking tour through Plaka and Monastiraki. Wander through Plaka's charming streets, adorned with quaint shops and traditional cafes. Then, venture to Monastiraki, known for its ancient landmarks like Hadrian's Library and the Roman Agora, and enjoy scenic views of the Acropolis while you walk.

payload.name: Athens Off the Beaten Track Private Guided Walking Tour
payload.description: Discover a side of Athens beyond the ancient monuments and crowded tourist spots with a private local guide well-versed in the Greek capital’s more authentic side. Your exact route will vary according to your guide, but you may well discover hip cafés, art galleries, bookshops, churches, and public spaces, as well as lively neighborhoods that most tourists miss.

payload.name: Private Half Day Tour to Cape Sounio
payload.description:
Join us on this extraordinary expedition to Cape Sounio, where every moment unveils the allure of ancient history against the backdrop of breathtaking natural beauty—a must for discerning travelers seeking an unforgettable experience!

The coastal drive leading to Cape Sounio is nothing short of spectacular, counted among the world's most scenic routes. A sense of anticipation builds, culminating in the awe-inspiring sight of the marble columns. This temple, constructed in the 5th century BC rose from the ruins of a previous structure destroyed by the Persians.

Cape Sounio isn't merely a sanctuary; it's a historical fortress of paramount significance for the Athenians. The brilliant white columns, standing steadfast for 25 centuries, extend a timeless welcome to travelers approaching Athens. Perched on the rocky promontory, the temple offers panoramic views of the nearby Cycladic islands and treats visitors to unforgettable sunset vistas.

payload.name: Cooking Class & Dinner with Greek Wines
payload.description: Learn how to make traditional Greek dishes in a four-hour cooking class. Prepare and eat a wide range of dishes, such as moussaka (main dish with meat), tyropitaria (fried cheese pies), and meze (side dishes). Cook using ancient recipes and local ingredients.  A small group size ensures that you get plenty of one-on-one attention from your teacher.  After eating the four-course meal, take home a personal notebook with each recipe.

payload.name: Athens Five-Course Greek Food and Wine Tasting with Actor Host
payload.description: During this indulgent lunchtime experience, you won’t just get to try five of Greece’s most storied, traditional dishes—you’ll watch as your actor host brings their history to life. Make your own way to the conveniently located Athens restaurant, and come hungry: You’ll enjoy a five-course, chef-prepared meal, featuring classic Greek flavors. Accompanying your meal, your actor host will dress as different characters that represent the stories behind each dish.

payload.name: Athens Downtown Private Tuk-Tuk Tour—100% Electric
payload.description: See the sights of Athens without contributing to the city’s pollution problems when you book this clean, green tour by 100% electric tuk-tuk. Enjoy 360-degree views of this historic city on a private adventure with a driver who’s happy to stop when you want. Highlights include the Acropolis, the ancient citadel that houses the Parthenon, Mt. Lycabettus, with sweeping city views, and the Panathenaic Stadium, home of the first modern Olympics.

payload.name: Greek Champagne Tasting Experience With Acropolis Views
payload.description:
Hey guys, we are Andromeda Travelers a group of gastronomy and cocktail enthusiasts, founder of a community group for dancers and we also run community groups that allow travellers to connect. We have been in Greece since 2012 and have met many interesting people who have shown me the best places to visit in Athens.

This experience will be led by Dimitris, our cocktails and spirits master. We will start with an hour of chatting and getting to know each other. We will then take you to some of the best bars and restaurants to enjoy the Athens nightlife just like a local, and some of them, with a spectacular view to the Acropolis.

payload.name: Athens: Live Like a Local Walking Tour and Beer Tasting
payload.description: Experience Athens like a local on a walking tour followed by a beer tasting. Grab a coffee in Monastiraki Square before your walk for an authentic experience, and discover hidden paths, history and stories of the city. Then learn about Greek beer culture with a masterclass, tasting and food pairing, so you'll leave feeling like a pro.

payload.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Experience with Wine and Herbs
payload.description: Explore the world of Extra Virgin Oil Olive, flavours, health & cosmetic benefits. Three Extra Virgin Olive Oils to try along with herbs, spices, cheese & wine. Categories of Olive Oil and Olive Regions in Greece.

payload.name: Athens: National Archaeological Museum Ticket
payload.description:
Experience the museum at your own pace with pre-booked admission ticket for your selected date and time, sent directly to your email.

Immerse yourself in the antiquities and exhibits on display from all over Greece.
